meanings.definition: A type of grass commonly used for lawns and golf courses.
meanings.sent1: The zoysia in our backyard feels soft under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The golf course was covered in lush zoysia grass.
meanings.sent3: I tripped over the zoysia and it tickled my toes!
meanings.sent4: The zoysia in the park was a green carpet inviting picnickers.
meanings.sent5: The zoysia in the garden was a vibrant green oasis.

meanings.definition: The genus of grasses to which zoysia grass belongs.
meanings.sent1: Zoysia is a type of grass that thrives in warm climates.
meanings.sent2: The zoysia genus includes several species of turf grass.
meanings.sent3: The zoysia grass family reunion was a lively event!
meanings.sent4: In the world of grasses, zoysia stands out like a star.
meanings.sent5: The zoysia genus is known for its resilience and beauty.
